info.title: Comcin API
info.description: API documentation for the Coalition of Micro-lending and Cooperative Institutions in Nigeria (Comcin)

post.summary: Register a new institution and create a user account
post.description: Creates a user and institution record with uploaded files in a single transaction.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user/institution to retrieve

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user/institution to act on

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user to retrieve notifications for

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Notification model for storing messages sent to users

user_id.description: ID of the user the notification belongs to

created_by.description: Admin or officer who created the notification

read_at.description: Timestamp when the notification was read

content.description: Detailed message body of the notification
content.example: Your payment has been confirmed. Thank you.

view_status.description: View status of the notification. 0 = Not viewed, 1 = Viewed
